name: ReorderApmRetentionFilters
description:
Reorder execution order of APM retention filters.

Use this tool to change the sequence in which APM retention filters are executed. This is useful for prioritizing certain filters over others in your Datadog configuration.

parameters.name: new_retention_filters_order
parameters.description: A JSON array representing the new order of APM retention filters, each with an 'id' and 'type'.

id.description: The ID of the retention filter.

data.description: A list of retention filters objects.

value_schema.description: The list of retention filters in the new order.
